data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Carazo, Nicaragua a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Carazo, Nicaragua
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Carazo, Nicaragua.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 76,016 believers in the state of Carazo with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Carazo, Nicaragua to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Lord, the the state of Carazo will disappear one day, but your Word will never disappear. Call all who claim Christianity to anchor their lives on your Word.
data.verse: Heaven and earth will disappear, but my words will never disappear.

data.prayer: Father, let those from the 76,016 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.section_summary:
the state of Carazo, Nicaragua has a population of 177,100.

We estimate Carazo has 76,016 people who might know Jesus, 94,317 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,767 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Carazo, Nicaragua to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

location.name: Carazo
